staccuracy 0.2.2

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

staccuracy 0.2.2

CRAN release: 2025-02-23

  • Add reg_aucroc() function to calculate AUC for regression models.
  • Corrected bug in p-value calculation.
  • Rewrote sa_diff() output to separate staccuracies from their differences. l- Use the (r+1)/(n+1) p-value calculation from North et al. (2003).

staccuracy 0.2.0

CRAN release: 2024-11-06

  • Added sa_diff() function for bootstrapped-based comparison of staccuracies.
  • var_type() is no longer exported since it is really an internal function.

staccuracy 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2024-10-03

  • Initial CRAN submission.
